name: charge
others_no_arg: $n charges into the fray!  All guts, no brains.
others_found: $n ducks down low, charges forward, and head-butts $N!
target_found: OOF!  $n rammed $s head into your stomach!  That HURT.
others_auto: $n bends down, points two fingers out from $s head, and begins running around in circles.
